description: ZSNES provides numerous save states from 0 to 99 (file extensions .ZS0 , .ZS1 , .ZS2 , and so on). To change the save state slot, use the "Pick State" option under the "Game" menu, or press the "F3" key and use the arrow keys.

NOTE: A ZSNES save state is different than an in-game save state. A game may only allow a user to save state at specific game milestones whereas ZSNES save states can be created at any time during gameplay.
